messages: b322419edbdb1caf0a62fce3d5cc1d08 (11:52): hi my msn isnt working, its the problem with an unregustered file although i cant remember exactly how to di it. anyone know?
b322419edbdb1caf0a62fce3d5cc1d08 (11:53): do*
b322419edbdb1caf0a62fce3d5cc1d08 (11:56): yes but everone uses it so im stuck
bb430821ce63bae89e76c077942ec347 (11:57): Maybe I'm gay then
bb430821ce63bae89e76c077942ec347 (11:57): Try un/reinstall?
b322419edbdb1caf0a62fce3d5cc1d08 (11:58): that dosent work its to do with un unregistered dll
b322419edbdb1caf0a62fce3d5cc1d08 (11:58): although i wouldnt know if vista has this problem still?
b322419edbdb1caf0a62fce3d5cc1d08 (11:58): (thats what im using)
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:01): er
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:02): try using an alternate client maybe?
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:02): GAIM, miranda etc etc
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:02): damian-: yeah, try GAIM or Trillian
bb430821ce63bae89e76c077942ec347 (12:03): That dont fix the DLL problem
bb430821ce63bae89e76c077942ec347 (12:03): thats like earthlink tech support tellin a client to reinstall total access when TCPIP stack is corrupted
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:03): You get the same problem with Gaim?
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:04): BetaBird4: not exactly.  I'm not telling you to abandon the MSN network--just use an alternative client to access it.
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:04): BetaBird4: does it really matter, people use it
40e6d149096cf6b1b4fbcced64021737 (12:04): well ... no offence but isnt whole MS gay ? :P
bb430821ce63bae89e76c077942ec347 (12:04): I know I know =P At the same time you dont need total access to dial up to earthlink - just use DUN connectoid
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:04): i still use MSN for work ;)
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:04): Ardonik: which one?
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:05): faileas: vanilla jabberd 1.4.4
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:05): Setting up that XML file is a pain, but you only have to do it once.  Then jabber just sits there, working.
b322419edbdb1caf0a62fce3d5cc1d08 (12:05): hmm neither i wil have to go install mans then.
b322419edbdb1caf0a62fce3d5cc1d08 (12:06): thanks anyway
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:08): Ardonik: wildfire here
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:09): Never used it.
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:09): pity some of the nicer features (like client management) got shifted totally over to the enterprise edition
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:09): its quite a nice system
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:09): especially if you know java, since you can extend it pretty easily
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:10): faileas: yeah, sure, but jabberd 1.4.x is pretty fast.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:10): Sure, they've moved to 2.x now, but that's all complicated and stuff.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:10): The original is the best.  Just get an mu-conference and jud plugin on top of it, and Boom!  Instant chat network.
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:11): jud?
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:12): Jabber User Directory.
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:12): ahh
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:12): i think wildfire comes with both those
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:12): When you use service discovery on it, you can search for the names of jabber users by their JID or real names.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:12): Of course, this requires a real Jabber client.  Like, not Gaim.
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:13): most config is web based and its self contained (though a mysql server is recommended)
fb4dbbe2a70f6a0a0eaa10dead26c669 (12:13): ;p
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:13): Psi is my favorite.
